if(specOn == true && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){//players
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 1203);
specialAmount -= 50; <-- there change tht t wat percentage u want the special to use up 0 makes it inf (but i woodnt put it to tht.)
getHit(3);
usingSpecial = true;

item.title: Change number of specs
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hi i want to no how to change the number of specs on a item.
In other words instead of my d hally takin 75% of my spec bar i want it takin 50% i put down the spec from 75 to 50 and it still dont work. look heres my code

if(specOn == true && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){//players if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 1203); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(3); usingSpecial = true;

Note: im using deltascape source

Thanks
